fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: - Check a player, if they are an evil faction member, stake them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You always survive attacks from evil faction members.
- If an evil faction member visits you, you will also stake them.
- If all evil faction members die and the game hasn't ended, you will become a Dayvigi (30) with 1 bullet and overkill attack.
